## Variace V(n,k)

```{r}
V <- function(n, k) {
  c = factorial(n)
  j = factorial(n-k)
  
  return (c/j)
}
```

## Variace s opakováním V\*(n, k)

```{r}
V_ <- function(n, k) {
  return (n^k)
}
```

## Permutace P(n) = V(n, n)

```{r}
P <- function(n) {
  return (V(n, n))
}
```

## Permutace s opakováním P\*(n1, n2, n3, ..., nk)

```{r}
P_ <- function(vec_n) {
  n = sum(vec_n) # velikost vektoru
  res_temp = factorial(n)
  for (pocet in vec_n) {
    res_temp = res_temp / factorial(pocet)
  }
  
  return (res_temp)
}
```

## Kombinace C(n, k)

```{r}
C <- function(n, k) {
  return (choose(n, k))
}
```

## Kombinace s opakováním C\*(n, k)

```{r}
C_ <- function(n, k) {
  return (choose(n+k-1, k))
}
```

## Použití

```{r}
P(10)
V(10, 5)
C(10, 5)

P_(c(10, 5, 2))
V_(2, 5)
C_(10, 5)
```
